ygData.subject: Telepathy
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone mentioned on one of the recent posts about FD that it was unfair that the NPCs had some sort of telepathy to know when one of its members saw you stand
ygData.messageBody:
Someone mentioned on one of the recent posts about FD that it was unfair
that the NPCs had some sort of telepathy to know when one of its members
saw you stand again and let everyone else in the mob know. In the interest
of fairness, doesn't every PC in the game already have telepathy? WIth
group say, auction, OOC, Tell, and Sohut, Pcs are able to talk to eachother
over a large area. I know that I have been in the hills of Queynos and
have been talking to a friend of mine in Freeport. Why should it be any
different from the NPcs. So waht if they are computer generated AI NPCs.

Shando, 16th circle, of the Silent Fist Clan
Bertoxxolous
